mapper.select: select count(1),approval_year from tb_product group by approval_year

select id,name from tb_product where id in
#{item}

SELECT approval_year as years,COUNT(1) FROM tb_product WHERE 1 = 1
and classificationId in (select classificationId from tb_classification where parentId = #{classification})
and administrative_area in (select city_id from tb_administrative_area where parent_id = #{parentId})
and administrative_area = #{parentId}
GROUP BY approval_year ORDER BY approval_year

SELECT t0.id as id,t0.approval_announcement_no_product as approvalAnnouncementNoProduct,t0.protection_scope as protectionScope, t0.name as name,t0.approval_year as approvalYear,t0.approval_authority_product as approvalAuthorityProduct, CONCAT(province_name,city_name) AS administrativeAreaName, ( SELECT t2. NAME FROM tb_classification t2 WHERE t2.parentId = '0000' AND SUBSTR( t0.classificationId FROM 1 FOR 2 ) = substr(t2.classificationId, 1, 2) ) AS classificationName FROM tb_product t0
order by ${orderByClause}
